Footnotes + Disclosures

  • All coverage ratios are illustrative and recalibrated every 9 minutes.
  • Claims require verified bite footage and kitchen timestamp.
  • Studio segments are assigned by queue velocity, not preference.
  • Plans exclude beige surfaces, plates, or kitchens of any kind.
